quality_check_questions.thinking_process: The thinking process involves verifying whether the specific ingredient "melted cheese" has been added to the hot dog as instructed. Melted cheese would appear as a gooey substance covering part of the hot dog, ensuring it is distinguishable from the existing condiments.
quality_check_questions.question: Has melted cheese been added on top of the hot dog?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: This question focuses on confirming the presence of fried onions on the hot dog. Fried onions typically appear as small, golden-brown pieces scattered over the top of the hot dog.
quality_check_questions.question: Have fried onions been added on top of the hot dog?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: The instruction specifies adding a barbecue tong as a dynamic element near the grill. This involves checking whether there is a visible pair of tongs placed near the grill area.
quality_check_questions.question: Is there a barbecue tong added near the grill?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Ensuring the added elements do not obscure the original hot dog components is crucial. This involves observing if the buns and sausages remain visible despite the new additions.
quality_check_questions.question: Are the hot dog buns and sausages still visible and identifiable?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: It is essential to confirm that the additional elements enhance the image without altering the original fire and grill details. This involves verifying that the flames and grill are still visible beneath the hot dogs.
quality_check_questions.question: Are the flames and grill visible beneath the hot dogs?
